name: Ext_R2_Meta_profile
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Meta.profile for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Meta.profile from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Profiles this resource claims to conform to
element.definition: A list of profiles [StructureDefinition](https://hl7.org/fhir/DSTU2/StructureDefinition.html)s that this resource claims to conform to. The URL is a reference to [StructureDefinition.url](https://hl7.org/fhir/DSTU2/StructureDefinition.url.html).
element.comment: `Meta.profile` maps to R4B `Meta.profile`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Profiles this resource claims to conform to

element.comment: `Meta.profile` maps to R4B `Meta.profile`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
